publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2666.1 Fiona Hyslop: Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2666) in the name of Mr Jim Wallace, insert at end "but, in so doing, regrets the creation of a legislative framework for imposing variable top-up fees in Scotland’s tertiary education system." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
